quote: What a forced lifestyle our technology, our inventions imposed on our lives when we tried to live synonymously with computers; when we stepped inside their world, we left the natural one behind.
quote_letters: WHAT A FORCED LIFESTYLE OUR TECHNOLOGY OUR INVENTIONS IMPOSED ON OUR LIVES WHEN WE TRIED TO LIVE SYNONYMOUSLY WITH COMPUTERS WHEN WE STEPPED INSIDE THEIR WORLD WE LEFT THE NATURAL ONE BEHIND
